input.sentences: we managed to bike way out here | into the middle of nowhere .
and it was such a beautiful and fun trip .
the only sign of civilization were those antennas .
what a view from up here !
and of course the ride down is always more fun !
output.sentences: In the middle of our vacation, we managed to get in a great bike ride.
The bike trip up the mountain was fun and beautiful.
Most of the time, you couldn't even see signs of civilization except for occasional antennas.
Going on a long bike ride was fun.
